com.kia.addressverification

Class AddressVerificationService

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Address verification "service" provided by fictional company KIA.

      • AddressVerificationService

        Parameters:
        liveMode - if true, runs in "live mode" (for demonstration purposes only - no external calls will be made.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public AddressVerificationResponse validate(AddressVerificationRequest request)
        For testing purposes... send in a particular city name or country code to elicit the desired response.
        • City name = "invalid" - returns the result "invalid" without suggested addresses
        • City name = "suggest" - returns the result "invalid" with suggested addresses"
        • City name = "exception" - throws an IllegalStateException
        • For all other city names, returns the result "valid".
        • For country code "WF", returns a NOT_SUPPORTED status with sub code "NO_DATA".
        • For all other countries and city names, returns the result "valid".
        In addition, if "live mode" is set to "true", the license needs to start with the prefix "PROD"; otherwise, the license must start with prefix "TEST."
        Parameters:
        request -
        Returns:
